TRAVEL NEWS



In the Headlines From Cheapflights.com's daily travel news and other sources:  Government eases Mexico, Canada & Caribbean passport rules thru September  AirTran will allow low-fare flyers to reserve seats in advance for a fee  Delta Air Lines cuts Mexico airfares  jetBlue partners with Google for new in-flight tracking maps  United Airlines Mexico sale offers one-way fares from $117  New York/JFK airport opens cell-phone parking lot  DOT Report: Flight delays the worst in 13 years The Lighter Side of Travel  Are You Suffering From 'Vacation Dysphoria'?  Pack Your Umbrella If You're Headed to the Wettest U.S. Cities  SkyMaul Catalog Pokes Fun at SkyMall In-Flight Catalog Trip Planning & Destinations  Fathers and Sons Bond, Share Fun in Special Getaways  Dr. Beach Picks 2007 Best Beaches  Don't Let Storms, Hurricanes Spoil Your Vacation  Bon Appetit Picks the Top Places to Eat  Beer Lovers Hit the Trail for Brewery Hopping  L.L. Bean to Build Maine Adventure Park  Big Names Headline at 'Ultimate' Sports Fantasy Camp  Marriott and Nickleodeon to Build Upscale Resorts






 





 
GETAWAY CALENDAR



Aspen (CO), June 2124: Janus Jazz Aspen Snowmass festival Buffalo (NY), June 1516: The Buffalo River Fest includes a river regatta and a classic-car show. Crested Butte (CO), June 2530: Fat Tire Bike Week Le Mans (France), June 1617: Le Mans 24 Hour Car Race London (UK), June 16: The Trooping of the Colour celebrates the Queen's birthday. New York City, June 16: Speedboats and cruisers ply the Hudson in the Powerboat Poker Run. Coming Soon: Dallas (TX), July 1315: Taste of Dallas Detroit (MI), July 48: Comerica CityFest Houston (TX), July 58: CaribFest Montreal (Canada), June 28July 8: Montreal Jazz Festival Newport (RI), June 28July 8: Sunset Music Festival San Francisco (CA), June 30July 1: Fillmore Jazz Festival Sarasota (FL), June 29July 1: Suncoast Offshore Super Boat Grand Prix
